name: Tamarind Sauce Recipe
description: Feel free to customize this easy tamarind sauce with your favorite spices and ingredients.

itemListElement.text: In a pot or non-stick pan over medium heat, combine water and tamarind pulp. Stir while simmering until the pulp dissolves, thickens, and the water reduces.
itemListElement.name: In a pot or non-stick pan over medium heat, combine water and tamarind pulp. Stir while simmering until the pulp dissolves, thickens, and the water reduces.

itemListElement.text: Strain the cooked tamarind concentrate through a sieve into a bowl, pressing to extract maximum liquid. Add a splash of water and reheat briefly if more liquid is needed.
itemListElement.name: Strain the cooked tamarind concentrate through a sieve into a bowl, pressing to extract maximum liquid. Add a splash of water and reheat briefly if more liquid is needed.

itemListElement.text: Heat a pot over medium. Mix tamarind liquid, light and dark soy sauce, palm sugar, and water. Cook until the sauce thickens, turns dark brown, and gets a glossy glaze. Serve immediately.
